nodes.bodyText: @tacigar @anuraaga hope you can give me a hand with these ones :)

Did you copy in the English strings here? It's better to leave empty string (should be what the extract messages tool did) which falls back to the default which is English. Otherwise it's harder to know what strings are pending translation.

nodes.diffHunk:

nodes.bodyText: I realized you must have manually set up the translation files - sorry for not documenting this command yet! I will do so but after addressing some current plans I have for the i18n setup.
